Package gui

Class ChooseBattleScreen

java.lang.Object
gui.ChooseBattleScreen
public class ChooseBattleScreen extends Object
The screen where the player can choose the battle they want to fight.
Author:
Celia Allen, Bede Nathan

  • Constructor Details

    • ChooseBattleScreen

      public ChooseBattleScreen(GameEnvironment gameManager)
      Constructor for the class ChooseBattleScreen. Sets the private variable gameEnvironment to the gameManager given, calls the initialize() method, and sets the frame to visible. Sets the private variable difficulty through the GameEnvironment class. Sets the private variable day via the method setDay(), and the private variable possibleBattles using the private variable day.
      Parameters:
      gameManager - , of type GameEnvironment. The game manager.

    • closeWindow

      public void closeWindow()
      Closes the frame frmChoosebattle.

    • finishedWindow

      public void finishedWindow()
      Calls the GameEnvironment method closeChooseBattleScreen, passing the ChooseBattleScreen object as a parameter.

    • setTxtrDescription

      public void setTxtrDescription(String id)
      Sets the value of txtDescription to the currently selected battle by filtering the available Battles using the given id number. Return type void.
      Parameters:
      id - , of type String. The currently selected Battle's id number.
